Elder Hierarch Fairy Noeti Mimilead:
Destroy Cocoons and Huge Cocoons in the Colonies Fay. Of course, the destruction of cocoons will not give us much - the fairies no longer be the same again, and the trees will be new cocoons.
But we can not sit idly by. We will work tirelessly with the cocoons, and sooner or later, our troubles will pass.
